title: Web Connection Protocol 5 Validate App Identity Success Response
description: Message sent by the Desktop Agent to an app after successful identity validation.

appId.title: appId
appId.description: The appId that the app's identity was validated against.

instanceId.title: instanceId
instanceId.description: The instance Id granted to the application by the Desktop Agent.

instanceUuid.title: instanceUuid
instanceUuid.description: Instance UUID associated with the instanceId granted, which may be used to retrieve the same instanceId if the app is reloaded or navigates.

implementationMetadata.title: ImplementationMetadata
implementationMetadata.description: Implementation metadata for the Desktop Agent, which includes an appMetadata element containing a copy of the app's own metadata.
